PERIL_INTEGRATION_ID.description: The ID for your custom Peril integration. You can find this inside the 'General' setting of your Integration, down under 'Basic information'.

PRIVATE_GITHUB_SIGNING_KEY.description: This is your key from the integration. First download the private key, then type this into terminal `cat '` then drag your file in to the terminal, then add `' | pbcopy` to the end. Press enter, and it will copy the contents to your pasteboard. The command should look like: `cat '/Users/orta/Downloads/artsy-peril.2017-05-05.private-key.pem' | pbcopy`

DATABASE_JSON_FILE.description: The GitHub repo address where you can get to the settings JSON file.

PERIL_BOT_USER_ID.description: You can't do this yet, but you should do it later. This is the user ID for the bot that Peril uses to comment. If you add this, then Peril can update and delete it's own comments.

PAPERTRAIL_URL.description: Optional: If you want to see logs via papertrail, this is your URL.

PAPERTRAIL_PORT.description: Optional: If you want to see logs via papertrail, this is your port.
